title: As a HUGE fan of Swain, I think they could have ruined all what made him original.
body:
- No more sixeyed bird.
- No more bald-ish head.
- No more Beatrice.
- No more crippled walk (a developer **just asked us players** if Swain was ever crippled.......)
- Can I also add, probably, no more old age?


Dear Riot, not every character needs to be young, fit, perfect and boringly standardized. Swain's old age, weird hairstyle, crippled walk and six-eyed crow were all things that made him deeply stand out. Remove those things and what do you get? A far more generical mage.

EDIT: Ok fine downvote me to oblivion, it looks like Riot knows their audience and are correct in removing elements of originality from Swain.

replies.body: Consider this: we don't see the staff. We don't see Beatrice.

He's got a big cloak all around him, and I know plenty of people with staffs who hold it directly in front of them to keep balance when not walking. We might just not be seeing it because he's keeping balance.

There are a bunch of birds. One of them could be Beatrice with a new design. Maybe its that one at the very front, sitting on the corpse.

You don't wait for details. You just insult and say how Riot's fucking up, but you never look for a bright side. Look for a bright side for once.
Fine, I'll give you that. I'll wait some more and see.
Beatrice is probably just not shown, I really dont think she is something they would remove.

Either way, I think it is way too early to be losing your shit over the vgu.

> Cripple: (of a person) unable to walk or move properly; disabled.

Likely they were playing with your words, he needs a walking cane but he isn't 'crippled'  per say.
> No more sixeyed bird.
No more bald-ish head.
No more Beatrice.
Can I also add, probably, no more old age?

You can't confirm any of this from the art work, aside from Beatrice not being present but that. It could even be that she is there but no more six eyes, you can't say for sure. From a creative standpoint, I think all of those ravens are Beatrice, possibly she is able to burst into a storm of ravens opposed to Swain just having an army of Ravens following him everywhere he goes.

You literally can only see his back, in a static splash art, from an indeterminate point in time or place. How exactly did you even get points 1-3? You literally can't see his face! And just barely the top of his head to the point we can't even tell if he's wearing a helmet!

And just because Beatrice hasn't been seen yet, doesn't mean she doesn't exist or that the six-eyes thing isn't part of his raven form or something. This isn't film theory, things outside a frame can still exist!

His Tyrant Swain skin already has no crippled walk already, with the in-universe reason being he healed himself or whatever once he became the ruler. And judging by the last issues of the Journal of Justice, that IS his last known canon look.

And the 'old age' thing is part of the design debate. Reav3 even mentions that Swain was always around 35-40ish, not 55+ that everyone ended up thinking he was. Probably cos of the facemask making no real way to determine his age, his 5-packs-a-day voice, and the crippled walk (which was because of injury and not old age but it added to the 'crippled old man' image).

Basically, Riot didn't see any reason to correct the old-man image, until now because of the redesign and they have to resolve whether they follow their own internal 'canon', or follow public perception. I'm fine either way, personally.

So, you're defending removing his crippled walk because in one skin he doesn't have it?

Does that mean if they rework Soraka she should be a robot, because she's a robot in one of her skins?

Swain's cripple was a thing that added A LOT to his originality: how did he end up crippled? Why did he refuse to heal? How badass is he that he became leader of a military country while being crippled?

And if Beatrice was still in, she would have been shown in this artwork. She's important enough they wouldn't have ignored her in the teaser. She's not in the teaser - she's not in the rework.
Again, Beatrice was another element that added A LOT of originality: what is Beatrice? Why does she have six eyes?
No, he is defending removing the crippled walk because canonically he isn't crippled.

In any case, I don't mind if Swain changes hairstyle and shows his face (heck, I'd like it if he showed his face).
But he needs to keep three things: the age, the limp, and above everything, Beatrice.

This is Swain, the man who is 3 steps ahead. This is someone you want to think deep on. 

IMO he’ll probably keep Beatrice (the crow motif is still in the preview and no one in Noxus officially uses crows) and he will probably still look frail though his age compared to Darius’s has come to debate every now and then.
At this point I just hope he keeps Beatrice. Maybe she's the bird in the front of the picture, but who knows?
